archetypes.title: Regime Gate
archetypes.summary: Allow or block downstream cards when regime metrics align (trend, vol, factors).
intent_phrases: only trade when the market is in a certain regime like trending or ranging
allow entries only when volatility or trend conditions are favorable
block trades when the regime is not what we want
filter signals based on trend strength or volatility regime

archetypes.title: Event Risk Window Gate
archetypes.summary: Block entries/exits for a configurable pre/post window around catalysts or macro events. Can also restrict to specific days of the week (e.g., Sunday-only, block Saturday/Monday).
intent_phrases: avoid trading around major events or news releases
block entries and exits in a window before and after catalysts
do not trade during specific high-risk time windows
only trade on certain days of the week like Sunday
block trading on specific days like Saturday or Monday morning
allow entries only on Sunday but not on other days
restrict trading to specific days of the week
